@JSPeterson65 An improved version would need to come back to the House for final passage. My ‚Äúno‚Äù vote on the inferior bill earlier this week doesn‚Äôt complicate that path. Quite the contrary; it strengthens the hand of conferees who feel the bill has to be improved, as I do.

@JSPeterson65 Jim, the alternative isn‚Äôt to do nothing. The alternative is to pass a two-party solution. It isn‚Äôt that difficult to do that. We did it with ocean shipping, sexual abuse, and postal reform just this week. The Pelosi House version won‚Äôt pass the Senate and won‚Äôt become law.
